End of an era: Rick’s last pic for Gisborne Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/19/end-of-an-era-ricks-last-pic-for-gisborne-herald/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/19/end-of-an-era-ricks-last-pic-for-gisborne-herald/ Wynsley WrigleySports-mad Herald photographer retires after 48-year career. Fri, 19 Jul 2024 00:32:55 +0000 Retired Gisborne Herald photographer Paul Rickard is pictured with his first camera, dating back to 1972, a Nikon 200m-500m Lens, and his last camera, a Pentax SLa, Nikon D6 Camera, Nikon 300m lens. Photo / Wynsley Wrigley
